Elements module
===============

.. graphviz::

   digraph {
      "poliastro.core.elements" -> "rv_pqw", "coe2rv", "coe2mee", "rv2coe";
   }

\
\
The :py:mod:`poliastro.core.elements` module contains a set of functions related to orbital elements
conversion.
